name: Daily Star UK
content: **** **** News Football Showbiz TV More News **Get The Daily Star download to your tablet every day** **Get the latest news from the Star straight to your phone and tablet with our official apps** Get your favourite newspaper straight to your tablet every day. You'll get the latest news from the Star straight to your phone and tablet with our official apps. Available from theApp StoreandGoogle Playaccess your favourite newspaper at the touch of a button wherever you are. Quick, free and easy to access the Daily Star app brings the latest news, sport and celeb gossip straight to your fingertips 24/7. We’ll keep you up to date so you won’t ever miss a story, a pic or a video wherever you are in the world - even when you're offline. Download the free app today and you'll never be out of touch! Streamlined design making articles easier to read and load faster Enhanced navigation to find the sections you want to read most More than 30 sections offering over 250 stories published daily Updated video player for fast playback Share articles and photos on social media Swipe through a curated list of the best stories of the day Email us if you have any issues with the app Download the iOS apphere Download the Android apphere Facebook X (Twitter) TikTok Instagram News Football Showbiz TV Life & Style Sport Tech Travel **Follow Daily Star on socials:** Contact Us About Us Work for us Crosswords Play Star Wins Beauty Box Subscription Community Standards Competition Rules Cookie Notice Corrections and Clarifications How to Complain Our Brands Privacy Notice AI Notice RSS feeds Terms and Conditions Newsletter Signup Syndication & Licensing Subscribe to Daily Star and Daily Star On Sunday newspapers Subscribe to tablet edition **© 2025 a Reach plc subsidiary** AtReach and across our entitieswe and our partners use information collected through cookies and other identifiers from your device to improve experience on our site, analyse how it is used and to show personalised advertising. You can opt out of the sale or sharing of your data, at any time clicking the "Do Not Sell or Share my Data" button at the bottom of the webpage. Please note that your preferences are browser specific. Use of our website and any of our services represents your acceptance of the use of cookies and consent to the practices described in ourPrivacy NoticeandCookie Notice.
